scripts.test: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli local
scripts.test-debug: HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_LISTEN_PORT=8125 HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each haibun-cli -c debug/config.json local
scripts.run-walkthrough: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=false haibun-cli walkthrough
scripts.vcapture-dev: HAIBUN_STAY=always run-vcapture test local build-local files
scripts.complete: HAIBUN_TRACE=true HAIBUN_KEY=test npm run test && npm run publish
